tameDP 3.4.0
  • Reference

    Reference

    Primary functions

    tame_dp()

    Tidy PSNUxIM data from Data Pack

    tame_plhiv()

    Tidy PLHIV data from Data Pack

    Supporting functions

    import_dp()

    Import PSNUxIM/Cascade tab from the Data Pack

    reshape_dp()

    Reshape Data Pack Long

    reshape_plhiv()

    Reshape PLHIV Data in Data Pack Long

    split_psnu()

    Clean & Separate PSNU and PSNU UIDS

    convert_dedups()

    Adjust Dedup values to negative values

    agg_dp()

    Aggregate Targets to IM or PSNU level

    clean_indicators()

    Clean Up Indicators and Disaggregates

    convert_mods()

    Duplicate and convert modalities to HTS_TST

    get_names()

    Import mechanism specific info from DATIM

    order_vars()

    Order variables

    apply_class()

    Apply variable class

    Utility functions

    is_file()

    Is the filepath correct for the Data Pack

    is_sheet()

    Check if sheet exits in Data Pack

    is_xls()

    Check if the filepath is .xls or .xlsx

    no_connection()

    Check if computer has internet connection

    grab_info()

    Pull Information from Data Pack "Home" Tab
